contents.item: Sometimes we must gravitate towards madness before we can levitate on greatness.
Look forward, not behind. "Your best days are still out in front of you." Be focus & keep your dreams ALIVE
Focus! (said a voice within me). We are here to craft emotions. To become a better person.﻿ Not to waste our serenity on someone who had a poor upbringing and are not taught manners.
Your purpose is your identity focus your energy on great purposes.
contents.owner: Amit Ray, Enlightenment Step by Step

contents.item: Each of us must have something to live for
If you are not aware of your destination, you are likely to become used by someone in accordance with his purpose and to work for a person who knows his plans and goals
You can be a small element in a corporate system serving your boss all your life and you will retire unsatisfied with your way of living
I don't get along with people who think they know everything and everyone.
Focusing on you target will enable you to achieve more in your life than any ordinary person can ever do
If we are not aware of who we are, how will we know where we are going or how we should get there

Success requires a focused attention of your time and energy. This is true no matter what you want to achieve – to change the world or simply change apartments. All success stories come down to one person having a focused aim – so focused at times it can look like an obsession.
contents.owner: Nigel Cumberland, 100 Things Successful People Do: Little Exercises for Successful Living

contents.item: People who have nothing much in mind for next week speak instead about the next century or millennium.
contents.owner: George F. Will, The Woven Figure: Conservatism and America's Fabric

contents.item: Do not focus on money, instead focus on a problem that needs to be solved for the world..money will follow you as a bi-product.
contents.owner: Manoj Arora, From the Rat Race to Financial Freedom

contents.item: It is better to focus on the mission than to earn money.
If you try to be everywhere at once, you won't be anywhere at all.
If you only focus on what is, you may never attain what could be. Focus on the possibilities.
When we start focusing our energy on the things we love, they come easier and more effortlessly over time.
contents.owner: Michael Thomas Sunnarborg, Balancing Work, Relationships & Life in Three Simple Steps

contents.item: When you look back with regret, that (regret, loss) becomes your focus. Then your focus directs you: you go back to that – again and again.Look forward now – and focus on your passions with joyful anticipation.Then your passion will fill the gap of your loss...and where you land us will amaze you!
Stop competing, stop judging, stop comparing, stop blaming and better you, for you.
Give your life purpose and focus. Position yourself to succeed
